mapper.insert: insert into order (id, order_number, payment_time, deliver_time, store_time, completed_time, cancel_time, amount, user_id, box_id, create_time, update_time, estimated_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estimatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deliver_time = #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, store_time = #{storeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, completed_time = #{completedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_time = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, box_id = #{boxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, estimated_time = #{estimatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
